attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at peak times the bus is over crowed and there is never enough space for everyone.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Bus services in Greater London are a matter for Transport for London and the Mayor's Office.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
